im.tox.jtoxcore

Interface ToxFriend


  • public interface ToxFriend
    Interface for a Friend in Tox. This interface only supplies very basic operations needed for the core workings of Tox The setters are used by internal mechanisms of JToxcore. They should never need to be called manually
    Author:
    sonOfRa
